about_the_game:
The Vanguard DLC is a great +300% value bundle to roll out the heavy machinery! You also get a headstart in the Season Pass!

Includes:
  • 5x Siege Imperator Ruby (Legendary card)
  • 5x Magnetic Bombs (Supreme card)
  • 20x A.I.M Bot
  • 40x S1ege Br3aker
  • 40x M0nitor Gn4ts
  • 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
  • 3x Season Pass Tiers

Assume control of the Outland invasion force. Use the heavy Siege Imperator Ruby and its smaller S1ege Br3eaker cousin to pave the way for your M0nitor Gn4ts and Magnetic bombs to wreak havoc! In the meantime, save up Outlander Tech by playing Outlander cards to empower your A.I.M Bot to be a force to be reckoned with.

With this DLC, you have the perfect kit to start your galactic conquest!
detailed_description:
The Vanguard DLC is a great +300% value bundle to roll out the heavy machinery! You also get a headstart in the Season Pass!

Includes:
  • 5x Siege Imperator Ruby (Legendary card)
  • 5x Magnetic Bombs (Supreme card)
  • 20x A.I.M Bot
  • 40x S1ege Br3aker
  • 40x M0nitor Gn4ts
  • 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
  • 3x Season Pass Tiers

Assume control of the Outland invasion force. Use the heavy Siege Imperator Ruby and its smaller S1ege Br3eaker cousin to pave the way for your M0nitor Gn4ts and Magnetic bombs to wreak havoc! In the meantime, save up Outlander Tech by playing Outlander cards to empower your A.I.M Bot to be a force to be reckoned with.

With this DLC, you have the perfect kit to start your galactic conquest!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12.4+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: Minion Masters - Vanguard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: The Vanguard DLC is a great +300% value bundle to roll out the heavy machinery! You also get a headstart in the Season Pass!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
